display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (All apneas + hypopneas with >50% flow reduction or discernible flow reduction with >=3% desat or arousal) / hour of sleep
description:
Harmonized by the NSRR team.

The definition of hypopnea events is consistent with the following clinical guidelines: American Academy of Sleep Medicine (AASM) Chicago 1999 standard. [Sleep 1999 (PubMed ID:10450601)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10450601)

[Search for all AHI variables consistent with the same clinical guidelines within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/apples/variables?search=chicago1999)

Refer to the source for detailed definition for respiratory events: :rditstpsg:
